What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy sharecropping owners (they are not called farmers anymore) secure sustenance at the expense of the lives of their brilliant children (Spann dishnowers). Alcoholism, prostitution and suicide infuse every aspect of their lives. We watch this affected tribe analyze life on Yahoo.com each day

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an example of creative freedom and having fun with an action movie. Well, until they buckle down to thinking about violence against one another without any negative consequences whatsoever.
